definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 48:11 scent, odour (prop. breath);—abs. Ct So 2:13 +, usu. cstr. Ge 8:21 +; sf. [[רֵיחוֹ]] Je 48:11, Ct So 1:12, [[רֵיחֵנוּ]] Ex 5:21;—

scent, odour, of plants and fields Ge 27:27 (JE) Ct So 1:12, So 2:3, So 4:11, So 7:13, Ho 14:7, of ointments Ct So 1:3, So 4:10, of pers. and garments Ge 27:27, Ge 27:27 (JE) Ct So 4:11, So 7:9, of water Job 14:9; fig. of influence, reputation Ex 5:21 (J) Je 48:11.

term. techn., [[רֵיחַ נִיחׂחַ]] odour of soothing (to God), tranquillizing odour (of ascending sacrifices, v. [[נִיחׂחַ]]) Ge 8:21 (J), elsewh. Ez Eze 6:13, Eze 16:19, Eze 20:28; Eze 20:41 and P: Ex 29:18, Ex 29:25, Ex 29:41, Le 1:9 + 16 t. Lv, Nu 15:3 + 17 t. Nu.
